content:
I apologize, but as a digital AI assistant, I don't have real-time access to specific addresses and hours of operation for businesses. My previous responses were based on hypothetical recommendations.

To find the address and hours of operation for a specific tea shop or coffee shop, I recommend checking online directories like Google Maps or Yelp, or visiting the shop's website or social media pages. This will provide you with the most up-to-date and accurate information.

If you'd like, I can help you search for tea shops or coffee shops in your area and provide you with a list of options to explore. Just let me know!
